column23:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • Virtis presents trendy flip flops to add to your footwear collection. The cushioned footbed with cool graphic prints make this pair an absolute favourite. Slip them on for a relaxing day.

  • Product Details

  • Open toed
column24:
black flip flops with slip-on styling
Has a padded thong style upper with branding on it
Cushioned footbed with print patterns on it
Tough outsole with patterned grooves
Warranty: 3 months from the date of purchase
column25:
against manufacturing defects only

  • Material & Care

  • EVA
    Wipe with a clean cloth to remove dirt
